review.title: “Good Company, OK benefits”
review.pros: Pros – Good hourly rate, ok benefits
review.cons: Cons – Management always looking for ways to cut hours

review.title: “Overall a good company in this area”
review.pros: Pros – Decent pay and decent benefits for this area, Worked 3 days on and 4 days off. 12pm - 12 am
review.cons: Cons – Always finding ways to cut your take home pay. They lost alot of business so they were always finding ways to put money back into the company
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend
